titles: A compendious chronicle of the kingdom of Portugal, from Alfonso, the first King, to Alfonso the Sixth, now reigning together with a cosmographical description of the dominions of Portugal / by John Dauncey.
author: Dauncey, John, fl. 1663.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Johnson for Francis Kirkman [and 2 others],
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
